Dinobot: Very well. I understand the circumstances, but [grunt] I was
think=
ing of another use for the Matrix, that would be more permanent
if it can b=
e pulled off. In any case, I know the exact location of the
Ark. I will hel=
p you.

A trooper came in then.

Trooper: Milord, Jotunn would like you to =
assist to a strategic
meeting with the Airtankers and himself. Please come =
by as soon as you
are free from other occupations.
